title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Innovating Science Education through Collaborative OER Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science concepts and basic digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explore science-related materials on OER platforms (e.g., Wikipedia, TED-Ed) and select three or more learning resources by applying credibility criteria.
Learners can collaborate with peers to design OER-based science education scenarios and incorporate feedback three or more times via shared documents.
Learners can analyze open educational practice cases and propose two or more improvement strategies applicable to their job field.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
